title: Founder
linkedin_headline: Founder at GodmodeHQ | Building the AI workforce so you can delegate the mundane tasks to AI agents
product_description: GodmodeHQ is building the AI virtual employees for sales that can automate sales tasks like sourcing, account research, enrichment and outreach. GMHQ can help you acquire more customers in a much more efficient way by freeing up time for your sales team.
value_props:
GodmodeHQ is building the AI virtual employees for sales that can automate sales tasks like sourcing, account research, enrichment and outreach. GMHQ can help you acquire more customers in a much more efficient way by freeing up time for your sales team.

GMHQ is the opposite of spray and pray outreach. It uses AI to analyse your internal knowledge and understand how you can best help the prospect based on the problems and pain points they have and your value propositions.

GodmodeHQ analyses and scours the web to find any custom information on your prospects. Then it uses this information to understand how best you can help solve the pain points of your customers. This information is used to send very targeted outreach messages that kick up your conversion rates and actually build customer relationships.
ideal_customer_profile:
<ideal_customer_profile>
<company_size_revenue>
<reasoning>
From the website content and pricing page information, GodmodeHQ targets businesses with significant operational scale that need automation. The pricing page specifically mentions "Mid-sized businesses with $10M+ revenue" as their target segment. The tool's enterprise features and integration capabilities suggest it's designed for companies with established processes and systems.
</reasoning>
<attribute>
- Mid-sized businesses with $10M+ annual revenue
- Companies with established sales and marketing teams
- Organizations large enough to benefit from automation but small enough to be agile in adoption
</attribute>
</company_size_revenue>

<industry_verticals>
<reasoning>
The website specifically highlights three main business categories under "Best fit" section: manufacturing and industrial businesses, small and medium-sized businesses, and services businesses. They provide specific examples in the services category and show use cases that span across these verticals.
</reasoning>
<attribute>
Primary verticals:
- Manufacturing and industrial businesses
- Service-based businesses (Insurance, financial advisory, consulting, investment banking, brokerage, wealth management)
- Technology companies
- Sales and marketing-focused organizations
</attribute>
</industry_verticals>

<technology_stack>
<reasoning>
The website shows multiple integration points and tools that their ideal customers should be using. This is evident from their "Works with where you work" section and integration capabilities mentioned throughout the site.
</reasoning>
<attribute>
Current technology stack should include:
- CRM systems (Salesforce, Hubspot)
- Email platforms (Gmail, Outlook)
- Professional networking tools (LinkedIn)
- Document management systems
- ERP systems (particularly for manufacturing/industrial businesses)
</attribute>
</technology_stack>

<business_challenges>
<reasoning>
The website explicitly outlines several pain points under their "Why?" section and throughout their solution descriptions. These challenges are consistently referenced in their use cases and customer testimonials.
</reasoning>
<attribute>
- Manual and tedious research tasks in sales and marketing
- Difficulty in leveraging AI without technical expertise
- Complex automation needs requiring significant engineering time
- Outdated ERPs limiting AI adoption
- Inability to scale customer qualification processes
- Challenge in maintaining personalized customer communications at scale
- Time-consuming manual data entry and research tasks
</attribute>
</business_challenges>

<buying_triggers>
<reasoning>
Based on the website's content and customer testimonials, several key events or situations trigger interest in their solution. These are evident in their use cases and "Solution" sections.
</reasoning>
<attribute>
- Need to modernize operations with AI
- Pressure to increase sales efficiency
- Growing manual workload in customer research and outreach
- Need to scale sales operations without proportionally increasing headcount
- Frustration with complex automation tools requiring technical expertise
- Desire to implement AI solutions without engineering resources
</attribute>
</buying_triggers>

<decision_makers>
<reasoning>
The website's content, particularly the dashboard demonstrations and use cases, indicates the primary decision makers they target. This is reinforced by their "Become the next Chief Automation Officer" messaging and feature descriptions.
</reasoning>
<attribute>
Primary decision makers:
- Sales Operations Leaders
- Marketing Directors/VPs
- Chief Revenue Officers
- Operations Managers
- Business Unit Leaders
- Technology/Digital Transformation Leaders
- Sales and Marketing Managers looking to implement AI solutions
</attribute>
</decision_makers>
</ideal_customer_profile>

This profile is based on direct evidence from the website content and supplementary research. The profile focuses on organizations that are looking to modernize their operations with AI, particularly in sales and marketing functions, and have the scale and resources to implement such solutions effectively.

title: CEO
linkedin_headline: CEO at Runway | Building AI tools for creative professionals
product_description: Runway is the modern and intuitive way to model, plan, and align your business for everyone on your team. Runway is the modern and intuitive way to model, plan, and align your business for everyone on your team.
value_props: Runway offers a comprehensive finance platform that simplifies financial management for businesses by providing intuitive budgeting and forecasting tools, automated reporting, and seamless integration with existing systems. Its user-friendly interface promotes collaboration among teams through role-based access controls, ensuring sensitive data is securely managed. With features like financial modeling and real-time scenario analysis, Runway empowers organizations to make informed, data-driven decisions while significantly reducing the time spent on financial processes. Backed by robust security measures, including SOC 2 Type II compliance, Runway positions itself as an essential partner for businesses looking to enhance efficiency and transparency in their financial operations.

<ideal_customer_profile>
<company_size_revenue>
<reasoning>
Based on the website content and market data, Runway targets growth-stage companies that need sophisticated financial planning. The customer testimonials feature companies like Superhuman, Kit, AngelList, and 818 Tequila, which are typically Series A to C companies. According to market data, the majority of their customers have 20-49 employees, indicating they target growing startups and mid-sized companies.
</reasoning>
<attribute>
- Company size: 20-200 employees
- Revenue range: $1M - $50M annually
- Growth stage: Series A to C funded companies
</attribute>
</company_size_revenue>

<industry_verticals>
<reasoning>

title: Head of Sales
linkedin_headline: Head of Sales at Terabee | Advanced Sensing Solutions for People Counting & Air Quality Monitoring
product_description: Terabee is a leading provider of advanced sensing solutions, specializing in time-of-flight technology for various applications, including people counting and air quality monitoring.
value_props:
People Counting
Accurate Occupancy Monitoring: Terabee's people counting technology transforms movement data into actionable insights for space optimization and facility management.
GDPR Compliance: Designed to ensure privacy while providing reliable data in all lighting conditions.

Air Quality Monitoring
Indoor Air Quality Sensors: Measure CO2, particulate matter (PM), temperature, and humidity to enhance workplace well-being and energy efficiency.
Data-Driven Insights: Help organizations maintain healthy environments and optimize energy performance.

Industrial Automation
Rugged Sensor Solutions: Includes distance measurement sensors, thermal imaging cameras, and machine vision technology for various industrial applications.
Versatile Integration: Easy-to-use sensor modules designed for seamless integration into existing systems.

Notable Achievements
Celebrated a decade of innovation in 2022, with significant growth and resilience through market challenges.
Developed a reputation for delivering high-performance sensing technologies that drive digital transformation across industries.

Terabee positions itself as a pioneer in smart building technology, offering innovative solutions that empower businesses to enhance operational efficiency, improve user experiences, and support sustainability initiatives through effective data capture and analysis.
